isis.stitle: 13 SPEED AND 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-713/18 SERIES - INSTALL - INPUT SHAFT

note.para: Apply Eaton lubricant #71215 or equivalent to the pilot bushing so that a film of lubricant covers the entire internal surface of the bushing.

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the I.D. of the main drive gear ( Figure 230).

figure.caption: Figure 230. Mark Main Drive Gear For Timing Purposes

step1.para: Use toolmaker's dye and mark the main drive gear for timing purposes ( Figure 230).
Mark any two (2) adjacent teeth on the drive gear. Repeat the procedure for the two (2) adjacent teeth directly opposite the first set marked.
Inside the case, mesh the lower countershaft drive gear marked tooth with either set of marked teeth on the main drive gear ( Figure 231).

figure.caption: Figure 231. Slide Input Shaft into Main Drive Gear

step1.para: From the front, slide the input shaft into the main drive gear ( Figure 231).
Install the drive gear spacer on the input shaft ( Figure 232).

figure.caption: Figure 232. Position Bearing on Input Shaft

step1.para: With the bearing external snap ring to the outside, position the bearing on the input shaft ( Figure 232).
Use a flanged-end driver and maul to seat the input shaft bearing ( Figure 233).
Install the bearing retainer snap ring ( Figure 234).

figure.caption: Figure 234. Install Bearing Retainer Snap Ring

note.para: To make mainshaft installation for the higher torque ratings (14's, 16's, and 18's), do not finish input installation; go to mainshaft installation at this time.

step1.para: Push the input shaft bearing back into the case bore ( Figure 235).

figure.caption: Figure 235. Position New Gasket on Bearing Cover Mounting Surface

step1.para: Position a new gasket on the bearing cover mounting surface, making sure to align the gasket oil return hole with the case oil return hole ( Figure 235).
Position the front bearing cover, making sure to align the cover oil return hole with the case oil return hole ( Figure 236).
Install the front bearing cover with six (6) bolts and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).
